tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE product_recall (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    recall_reason TEXT,
    recall_date DATE,
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE recall_participants(
    participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    participant_role VARCHAR(50),
    recall_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (recall_id) REFERENCES product_recalls(recall_id)
);

CREATE TABLE recall_actions(
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    action_description TEXT,
    action_date DATE,
    participant_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES recall_participants(participant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProductRecalls (
  recall_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  recall_reason TEXT NOT NULL,
  recall_date DATE NOT NULL,
  quantity INTEGER NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Withdrawals (
  withdrawal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  withdrawal_reason TEXT NOT NULL,
  withdrawal_date DATE NOT NULL,
  quantity INTEGER NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE RecallLogs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  recall_id INTEGER REFERENCES ProductRecalls(recall_id),
  action_taken TEXT NOT NULL,
  action_date DATE NOT NULL,
  employee_id INTEGER REFERENCES Employees(employee_id)
);
